mobileResponsivenessTip: Optimize images for mobile to reduce loading times and improve responsiveness.
loadingSpeedTip: Consider reducing the size of images and using caching techniques to improve loading speed.
seoOptimizationTip: Improve meta descriptions and add more relevant keywords to improve SEO performance.
userExperienceTip: Ensure a consistent and clear navigation structure across all pages to improve user experience.
bookingFlowTip: Simplify the booking process by reducing the number of steps required to complete a reservation.
tips: Consider adding more high-quality images to showcase your hotel rooms and amenities.
Implement a blog or content marketing strategy to enhance SEO and customer engagement.
